sqlMap.select: select ENTITY_ID, FATHER_ENTITY_ID, ISSUER_NAME, ISSUER_CODE, ISSUER_ENGLISH_NAME, ISSUER_ADDRESS, ISSUER_ENGLISH_ADDRESS, ISSUER_POSTCODE, ISSUER_TELEPHONE, ISSUER_FAX, ISSUER_COMMENT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, USER_ID from TB_ISSUER where ENTITY_ID = #entityId:VARCHAR# and FATHER_ENTITY_ID = #fatherEntityId:VARCHAR#

select ENTITY_ID, FATHER_ENTITY_ID, ISSUER_NAME, ISSUER_CODE, ISSUER_ENGLISH_NAME, ISSUER_ADDRESS, ISSUER_ENGLISH_ADDRESS, ISSUER_POSTCODE, ISSUER_TELEPHONE, ISSUER_FAX, ISSUER_COMMENT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, USER_ID from TB_ISSUER
order by $orderByClause$

sqlMap.update: update TB_ISSUER set ISSUER_NAME = #issuerName:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_CODE = #issuerCode:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_ENGLISH_NAME = #issuerEnglishName:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_ADDRESS = #issuerAddress:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_ENGLISH_ADDRESS = #issuerEnglishAddress:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_POSTCODE = #issuerPostcode:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_TELEPHONE = #issuerTelephone:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_FAX = #issuerFax:VARCHAR#, ISSUER_COMMENT = #issuerComment:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:CHAR#, DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#, USER_ID = #userId:VARCHAR# where ENTITY_ID = #entityId:VARCHAR# and FATHER_ENTITY_ID = #fatherEntityId:VARCHAR#
